attributes.title: The Science of Tyaga Is To Manifest The Space of Paramashiva!
attributes.description:
10 MARCH 2020 (8:00 AM IST,TUESDAY)

TYAGA  LIBERATES YOU FROM MOST POWERFUL LOGICALLY CONVINCING JUSTIFYING DELUSIONS. THERE ARE SOME DELUSIONS ABOUT WHICH YOU ARE SO CONVINCED LOGICALLY AND THAT DELUSION HAS JUSTIFIED IT'S EXISTENCE TO YOU IN SUCH ABSOLUTE CUNNING WAY, YOU EVEN FORGOT IT IS DELUSION YOU ASSUMED. 

IN AGAMA, IT IS DESCRIBED AS PAASA. IN VEDANTA; MAYA. IN VARIOUS SAMPRADAYA, VARIOUS WORDS ARE USED. THE DELUSIONS WHICH HAS CONVINCED YOU ABOUT THE NECESSITY OF ITS EXISTENCE AND THE DELUSIONS WHICH MAKES YOU FEEL, YOUR VERY CORE EXISTENCE NEEDS THOSE DELUSIONS FOR SURVIVAL, 

EXAMPLE: YOU HAVE BEEN CONVINCED SYSTEMATICALLY BY THE SOCIETY THAT YOU ARE ONLY BODY. I AM NOT SAYING YOU ARE NOT BODY, BUT I AM AGAINST THE IDEA YOU THINKING YOU ARE ONLY BODY. I AM 100% SUPPORTING KEEPING THE BODY HEALTHY AND HAPPY. I AM ONLY ASKING YOU TO REALISE YOUR ATMATATTVA. 

BEYOND THE LOGIC OF MIND, THERE IS SOMETHING CALLED CONSCIOUS INTERFERENCE IN YOU. A STRONG UNCONSCIOUS PATTERNS, EVEN KNOWING IT YOU ARE NOT ABLE TO BREAK, IS INFLUENCE OF EARTH ELEMENTS ON YOU. THE FLUID MOOD SWINGS IN YOU, THE INTERFERENCE OF WATER ELEMENTS. INTENSE EMOTIONAL BURSTS, NOT ONLY THE OTHERS WILL NOT BELIEVE YOU, BUT YOU ARE NOT ABLE TO TRUST THE DECISIONS YOU MAKE AT THAT TIME, IT IS INTERFERENCE OF FIRE ELEMENT. ABSOLUTE DULLNESS, EXTREME BOREDOM AND SUICIDAL, DOESN'T WANT TO EXIST, JUST WANT TO DISAPPEAR, ABSOLUTE LIFE NEGATIVE IS INTERFERENCE OF AIR ELEMENT ON YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS. 

TYAGA IS THE MOST SWEETEST, MOST POWERFUL STRATEGY TO LIBERATE YOURSELF FROM ALL THE FIVE. TYAGA IS BULLDOZING ALL THE DELUSION. LIFE IS ALL ABOUT YOUR ABILITY TO COGNISE THE HIGHER IDEALS, YOU ABILITY TO DO TYAGA AND BE COMMITTED TO THE HIGHER IDEALS. THE HIGHEST IS IN YOU AS CONSCIOUS BLUEPRINT. YOUR ABILITY TO DO TYAGA AND STAND FOR IT. 

CONSCIOUS TYAGA - NOTHING BUT ABSOLUTE CONSCIOUS TYAGA CAN MANIFEST WHAT YOU WANT. CONSCIOUS TYAGA IS EQUIVALENT TO DOING 1000 COMPLETION ON THE PATTERN. BURNING BRIDGES WITH THE PAST IS TYAGA. BURNING THE PAST ITSELF IS TYAGA. 

THE INTENSITY WITH WHICH YOU ARE AWAKENING YOUR EXISTENCE, MILLION TIME PARAMASHIVA MANIFEST. TYAGA INVOKES THE LOVE OF PARAMASHIVA. ITS LIKE IF YOU REMOVE ONE BRICK FROM THE DAM, THE WHOLE WATER WILL FLOOD AND GUSH IN YOU. THE GOOD THING IS YOU WILL NOT DIE. YOU WILL BECOME ONE WITH IT.PARAMASHIVA JUST FLOODS IN YOU. 

COGNISING TYAGA IS EQUIVALENT 100 MILLION DOLLAR LOTTERY. STARTING TO PRACTICE TYAGA IS 100 BILLION DOLLAR. TASTING THE LOVE FROM TYAGA IS TRILLION DOLLAR LOTTERY. TYAGA IS THE POWERFUL COGNITION FOR ALL SUPERPOWERS. 

THROUGH TYAGA, I AM PREPARING ALL OF YOU FOR PARAMASHIVA TO MANIFEST. UNCLUTCHING, COMPLETION, ANANDA GANDA


10 YEARS OF MY LIFE - WHOLE THING WAS FOR THE STATE OF PARAMASHIVA.GOING VILLAGE TO VILLAGE AND TEACHING UNCLUTCHING , GIVING INITIATION , GIVING KALPATARU PROGRAM - THIS WHOLE THING IS FOR THE SPACE OF PARAMASHIVA. THE SCIENCE OF ONENESS IS TO MANIFEST THE POWERS OF PARAMASHIVA. NOW, THE SCIENCE OF TYAGA IS TO MANIFEST THE BEING OF PARAMASHIVA."

THE NEW NAME OF THE LEELA DHYANA PROGRAM - ONENESS WITH AVATAR. I AM OPENING THE DOORS WIDE FOR PEOPLE TO ATTEND. THIS IS GOING TO INTENSELY MAKE YOU MANIFEST THE BEING OF PARAMASHIVA. THIS PROGRAM IS ALL ABOUT INITIATING YOU INTO MANIFESTING THE BEING OF PARAMASHIVA. 

I AM GIVING THIS OPPORTUNITY IN TWO WAYS: 
ANYBODY WHO HAS DONE PADA PUJA ONCE, CAN PAY THE REMAINING AMOUNT AND DO THE PROGRAM. I WANT THOUSANDS AND THOUSANDS OF YOU TO EXPERIENCE ONENESS WITH THE AVATAR. 
IF YOU HAVE DONE INNER AWAKENING EVEN ONCE, AND STILL CONNECTED. PROVE YOU ARE CONNECTED BY CAUSING ONE MORE PERSON, YOU CAN ATTEND FOR FREE, 

IN THIRUVANNAMALAI, YOU ARE IN MY PHYSICAL PRESENCE. THE PROGRAM WILL BE MULTILINGUAL. THE INITIATION IS HAPPENING FOR YOU TO MANIFEST THE BEING OF PARAMASHIVA. 

I AM RADIATING THE SUPERPOWER TYAGA NOW, WITH THE GRACE OF PARAMASHIVA, I WILL CONNECT ALL OF YOU WITH PARAMASHIVA  NOW - OM NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVOHAM.
